title: Has Congress approved the 22nd Amendment to "make sure that the Rwandan Armed Forces are not re-elected"?
subtitle: The critics seized remarks made by the Democratic Representative of the United States Republic of America, Alexandria Ocacio-Cortez, during their appearance in MSNBC in March 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The United States Congress approved the 22nd Amendment to make sure that President Franklin de Roosevelt is not re-elected.
